```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(hakaiR)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r import data, include=FALSE}
sites <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HakaiInstitute/jsp-data/master/data/sites.csv") %>% 
  select(site_id, site_name, region, zone)

surveys <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1F04L3heVXck9Co6THrE8vMzuu3O4zq4NwxC8FJdL5Uk/edit#gid=0", sheet = "survey_data") %>% 
  mutate(survey_date = as.Date(survey_date))

seines <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1F04L3heVXck9Co6THrE8vMzuu3O4zq4NwxC8FJdL5Uk/edit#gid=0", sheet = "seine_data", na = "NA")

fish <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1F04L3heVXck9Co6THrE8vMzuu3O4zq4NwxC8FJdL5Uk/edit#gid=0", sheet = "fish_field_data", na = "NA")

survey_seines <- left_join(surveys, sites, by = "site_id") %>% 
  right_join(seines, by = "survey_id")
write_csv(survey_seines, here("2020", "raw_data", "survey_seines.csv"))

fish_ss <- left_join(fish, ss, by = "seine_id")
write_csv(fish, here("2020", "raw_data", "fish.csv"))
```

```{r catch statistics}
# Summary table of each species retained
sites_spp_summary <- survey_seines %>% 
  select(survey_id, survey_date, site_id, ends_with("taken"), region, zone) %>% 
  mutate(survey = paste(region, zone, sep = '_')) %>% 
  rename(sockeye = so_taken,
         pink = pi_taken,
         chum = cu_taken,
         coho = co_taken,
         chinook = ck_taken,
         herring = he_taken
         ) %>% 
  replace_na(list(n = 0)) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  gather(sockeye, pink, chum, coho, chinook, herring, key = "species", value = "n") %>%
  group_by(survey_id, survey, survey_date, site_id, species) %>% 
  summarize(total_retained = sum(n)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  filter(site_id != "D07")

spp_summary <- sites_spp_summary %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  summarize(n = sum(total_retained)) %>% 
  rename(total = n) %>% 
  arrange(desc(total))

knitr::kable(spp_summary)


sites_spp_summary$species <-
  factor(
    sites_spp_summary$species,
    levels = c("sockeye", "pink", "chum", "coho", "chinook", "herring"),
    labels = c("Sockeye", "Pink", "Chum", "Coho", "Chinook", "Herring")
  )

sites_spp_summary$site_id <-
  factor(
    sites_spp_summary$site_id,
    levels = c("D27", "D22", "D09", "D10", "D35", "J03", "J02", "J09", "J11")
  )

sites_spp_summary$survey <- 
  factor(
    sites_spp_summary$survey, 
    levels = c("DI_W", "DI_C", "DI_E"),
    labels = c("DI_West", "DI_Central", "DI_East"))

ggplot(sites_spp_summary, aes(x = survey_date, y = fct_rev(site_id), label = site_id, fill = total_retained, color = survey)) +
  geom_point(size = 3, shape = 21) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "black") +
  guides(fill = guide_colourbar(order = 1),
         color = guide_legend(order = 2)) +
  facet_wrap( ~ species) +
  scale_x_date(limits = c(as.Date("2020-05-15"), NA)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  xlab("Survey Date") +
  ylab("Site ID") +
  labs(fill = "Total Retained", color = "Survey") +
  theme(
    strip.background =element_rect(fill="lightgray"),
    strip.text = element_text(face = "bold"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray90",
                                    colour = "gray90",
                                    size = 0.5, linetype = "solid"),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(size = 0.5, linetype = 'solid',
                                    colour = "white"), 
    panel.grid.minor = element_line(size = 0.25, linetype = 'solid',
                                    colour = "white")
  )

ggsave(here("2020", "figures", "site_success.png"), height = 5, width = 6)
```
